content.text:
# 20th Japan Film Professional Awards

The  was the 20th edition of the Japan Film Professional Awards. Films of 2010 which had not already won a major domestic film award were eligible. Instead of an award ceremony, a charity event for the film  was held to commemorate the 20th edition. A preview screening of the film took place on May 31, 2011, at Kadokawa Cinema Shinjuku.
Awards
*Best Film: Sawako Decides
*Best Director: Takahisa Zeze (''Heaven's Story)
*Best Actress: Yuki Uchida ()
*Best Actor: Sousuke Takaoka (Sankaku'')
*Best New Director: Tetsuya Mariko (')
*Best New Encouragement: Kengo Kora (')
*Best New Encouragement: Kiko Mizuhara (Norwegian Wood)
*Special:  (For his longtime work.)
